tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    face_id UUID,
    CONSTRAINT fk_face FOREIGN KEY (face_id) REFERENCES facial_features(face_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ImageData (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    image_data BYTEA,
    image_height INT,
    image_width INT
);

CREATE TABLE HomeSecurity (
    security_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    image_id INT,
    face_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE ImageData (
  image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_data BYTEA
)
